_sText:
Map Info: race_revolution by ZaLoS This map was made for the rally race mod. This map contains 26 car spawn points and has 2 equal distance starting areas with 13 spawn points each. This is to help prevent as many pile ups. This map is a short one, fastest times recorded at around 1min. The fans are there to knock you around so avoid'm! Have fun! play this map and more on the intox. rally race server: 72.5.86.129:27015
Prefab: Want to make a rally race map? Use my prefab, it has all the entities you need to get started: http://www.fpsbanana.com/prefabs/4365
